meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alyson Lamble John Hendel Ben Hemmens Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7113.

td.p: Alyson Lamble, an account executive originally from Kansas City, Missouri
John Hendel, a playwright from Los Angeles, California
Ben Hemmens, a stay-at-home dad from Falls Church, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,801)

tr.td: "F" IN GEOGRAPHY
WORDPLAY-POURRI
SHOW YOUR METAL IN POP CULTURE
CEOs
LIVING SPACES
PUT 'EM IN ORDER
(Alex: --chronological order for us.)

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Ben
John
Alyson

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ben
John
Alyson
AFTERNOON TEA
SIGNERS OF THE DECLARATION OF INDEPENDENCE
FICTION
SPORTS INJURIES
ALL THAT JAZZ
SIX RHYMES
(Alex: Each correct response will be something that rhymes with the word "six", the number six.)
